To:- - . :GiI.G.B.19/3/17.858.I have just been officially informed that the Emperor will receive the chiefs of the Allied h.ilitary Missions to-morrow morning separately, and that he has. been given permission by the gfvernment to go... t* Tsarsko-Selo and then to Romanoff. A long.telegram follows.
